alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 25 at 2:53PM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches mainly well north of Route 28. Total snow accumulations 8 to 16 inches for areas north of Route 28 and Old Forge. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to snow cover roads and some blowing snow. Areas of blowing snow could also significantly reduce visibilities. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4405 7506 4406 7509 4408 7509 4408 7515 4406 7516 4402 7516 4404 7513 4402 7514 4403 7506 TIME Y22M12D25T1200Z-Y22M12D26T0000Z COORD...4405 7504 4403 7506 4405 7506 4404 7516 4398 7517 4398 7514 4391 7516 4393 7512 4391 7513 4392 7506 TIME Y22M12D26T0000Z-Y22M12D26T1400Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
